channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - April 12, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-12-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We’ve got sessions from great games like *Dream Askew*, *Rhapsody of Blood*, the soon-to-be-Kickstarting *[Hearts of Wulin](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/hearts-of-wulin.html)*, and much more! Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
